sense.gloss: flowers in full bloom, time of year in which flowers are in full bloom
the age at which someone (esp. a woman) is at the peak of their beauty

sdata.j: ↑詩人↑↓しじん↓としての↑彼↑↓かれ↓は２０↑代↑↓だい↓が↑花盛↑↓|はなざか↓り|だった。
sdata.e: As a poet, he flowered in his twenties.

sdata.j: ↑庭↑↓にわ↓のバラは↑今↑↓いま↓↑花盛↑↓|はなざか↓り|です。
sdata.e: The roses in the garden are in full bloom.
